channel.title: 718+ webclient blackscreen
channel.description: Hello, I was trying to make a webclient when this happened. Whenever I open up my webclient, I get this java warning thing where you gotta accept the risk, click run, etc. but after I clicked this, the screen just stays black. I am pretty sure I jarred the client the right way, I tested it and it works. Also my friends can play with another jarred client, but they get the same problem when they try to use the webclient (so there are 2 clients and 2 webclient, 1(web)client localhost and 1 for others, doesn't really matter tho.) This is what my HTML looks like, seems alright to me but I don't know that much about HTML tho. [code] webclient js" value="1"/> [/code] Jarred client works, Loader works, everything works, except for the webclient. anyone got a clue? thanks for the help

item.title: 718+ webclient blackscreen
item.dc:creator: @Monkey-G Monkey-G
item.description:
@Monkey-G wrote:

Hello,
I was trying to make a webclient when this happened. Whenever I open up my webclient, I get this java warning thing where you gotta accept the risk, click run, etc. but after I clicked this, the screen just stays black. I am pretty sure I jarred the client the right way, I tested it and it works. Also my friends can play with another jarred client, but they get the same problem when they try to use the webclient (so there are 2 clients and 2 webclient, 1(web)client localhost and 1 for others, doesn’t really matter tho.)
This is what my HTML looks like, seems alright to me but I don’t know that much about HTML tho.

[code]

webclient js" value="1"/> [/code]

Jarred client works, Loader works, everything works, except for the webclient. anyone got a clue?
thanks for the help

Read full topic
